name: portfolio
description: Performance-optimized portfolio following the 14KB rule for maximum speed

scripts.copy-assets: cp src/*.pdf src/*.json src/*.txt src/*.xml src/.htaccess src/structured-data.json dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.compress: gzip -9 -c dist/index.html > dist/index.html.gz && gzip -9 -c dist/style.css > dist/style.css.gz && gzip -9 -c dist/app.js > dist/app.js.gz
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run minify:html && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js && npm run copy-assets && npm run compress

author: Sahil Chouksey
